name: When Worlds Kaleid
description:
Cory's world was gray and dull, until he discovered a kaleidoscope that allowed him to peer into a new world! Use the power of the kaleidoscope to create interactions between a colorless corporate dimension and a colorful forest dimension. Solve puzzles by manipulating the kaleidoscope to your own advantage!

How to Play

WASD / Arrows  =  Walk

Hold Space  =  Grab Crate

Move Mouse  =  Move Kaleidoscope

Made By
